item.title: sorting Blazor, Photino, Uno and Avalonia

item.title: my state of Ergotron: 2022

item.title: flippant remarks about CSS animations
item.description: These flippant remarks are biased toward my experience with Angular animations which kept me away from working with CSS animations directly. My 21st century return to CSS animations is laced with disappointment. What should be found here in this document‚Ä¶
